title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using an email and password with valid input data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input a valid email address and a valid password with required complexity.
Submit the registration form.
Check that the user receives a registration success confirmation and is redirected appropriately.

title: User Login via Email and Password
description: Verify that registered users can log in successfully using correct email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login is denied with an incorrect password and meaningful error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and incorrect password.
Click the login button.
Check that login fails with an error message indicating invalid credentials.

title: OAuth Login with Google
description: Verify that users can authenticate using Google OAuth and are granted access on successful authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the 'Login with Google' button.
Complete OAuth flow with valid Google account credentials.
Confirm user is logged in and redirected to the user dashboard.

title: OAuth Login with GitHub
description: Verify that users can successfully log in using GitHub OAuth and access the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click 'Login with GitHub' button.
Complete OAuth flow using valid GitHub credentials.
Check user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard.

title: Password Reset - Request Email
description: Verify users can request a password reset email with a registered email address.

steps.description: Navigate to Forgot Password page.
Input a registered email address.
Submit the password reset request.
Check that a confirmation message about password reset email sent is displayed.

title: Password Reset - Invalid Email Submission
description: Verify that requesting password reset with an unregistered or invalid email shows an error or no leak of information.

steps.description: Navigate to Forgot Password page.
Input an unregistered or invalid email address.
Submit password reset request.
Verify that the system shows a neutral message without confirming registration status.

title: Resume Upload - Valid PDF File Under Size Limit
description: Verify that users can successfully upload a valid PDF resume file below 5MB and parsing triggers.

steps.description: Navigate to the Resume Upload page.
Upload a valid PDF resume file less than 5MB.
Confirm file is accepted, AI parsing initiates, and user is redirected to the resume editor with structured data loaded.

title: Resume Upload - Valid DOCX File Under Size Limit
description: Verify that a DOCX resume file under 5MB uploads and parses correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Resume Upload page.
Upload a valid DOCX resume file less than 5MB.
Validate file acceptance, successful AI parsing, and navigation to editor with parsed content.

title: Resume Upload - Reject Unsupported File Types
description: Ensure that uploading unsupported file formats is rejected with an informative error message.

steps.description: Attempt to upload an unsupported file type such as .exe or .txt.
Verify the upload is rejected and appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Resume Upload - Reject Oversized Files
description: Validate that resume files larger than 5MB are rejected with clear messaging.

steps.description: Try uploading a PDF or DOCX file exceeding 5MB size limit.
Confirm upload is disallowed and user sees an explanatory error message.

title: AI Parsing Accuracy and Structured Resume Generation
description: Verify that the AI-based Google Gemini parsing extracts all major sections accurately and structures resume data correctly.

steps.description: Upload a sample resume file during testing.
Check that parsed data includes personal info, experience, education, skills, and projects sections correctly populated.

title: Rich Text Editor Functionality - Edit Sections
description: Verify users can edit all resume sections using the TipTap editor: personal info, experience, education, skills, projects.

steps.description: Open a resume in the editor.
Modify text fields in multiple sections.
Verify changes are reflected immediately in the live preview.

title: Rich Text Editor - Drag and Drop Section Reordering
description: Verify that resume sections can be reordered by drag-and-drop and the order changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Drag a section (e.g., Experience) to a different position.
Confirm the resume preview updates to reflect new section order and changes persist on save.

title: AI Enhancements in Editor
description: Validate that invoking AI enhancement features updates summaries, skills, achievements appropriately and instantly.

steps.description: Edit a section then trigger AI enhancement for summary or skills.
Check that AI-generated content is integrated correctly without overwriting user edits unintentionally.

title: Resume Save and Persistence
description: Verify that saving a resume persists all changes, and the saved version reloads accurately from the dashboard.

steps.description: Make changes to a resume in editor.
Save the resume.
Navigate to the user dashboard and reopen the saved resume.
Ensure all edits are present and correctly displayed.

title: Resume Delete Functionality
description: Verify users can delete resumes from the dashboard and deleted resumes are no longer accessible.

steps.description: From the dashboard, delete an existing resume.
Confirm the resume disappears from the list and attempts to access the deleted resume fail.

title: Template Selection and Customization
description: Verify users can switch between ATS-optimized templates, customize color themes, and see instant preview updates.

steps.description: Open resume editor and navigate to template selection.
Select different templates and apply custom color themes.
Validate that preview updates immediately with selected template and color theme.

title: ATS Analyzer - Score Calculation and Keyword Matching
description: Verify ATS Analyzer calculates AI-driven resume scores, matches keywords accurately, and presents detailed suggestions.

steps.description: Submit a resume and job description to ATS Analyzer.
Check that analyzed score is displayed with keyword matches and actionable improvement tips.

title: ATS Analyzer - Handle Incomplete or Malformed Job Descriptions
description: Verify the ATS Analyzer gracefully handles incomplete or poorly formatted job descriptions without crashes.

steps.description: Submit a resume for analysis together with an incomplete or malformed job description.
Confirm system returns a meaningful error or partial results without failure.

title: Machine Learning Job Matching - Compatibility Scoring
description: Validate that ML-powered job matching returns compatibility scores and skill gap analysis correctly for provided resumes and job descriptions.

steps.description: Submit resume data and job description via the job matching interface.
Check that compatibility scores and skill gap insights are presented and consistent with input.

title: GitHub OAuth Profile and Projects Import
description: Verify GitHub OAuth integration imports user profile, project details, and contributions into the resume's projects section properly without duplication.

steps.description: Authenticate with GitHub using OAuth.
Trigger import of profile and projects.
Ensure imported data populates projects section accurately and no duplicates are created on repeated imports.

title: User Dashboard - Resume Listing and Version Management
description: Validate that the dashboard lists all saved resumes including versions with options to create new versions, delete, and access quick actions.

steps.description: Open user dashboard.
Check all saved resumes and versions are listed with visible management options.
Create a new version of a selected resume.
Verify the new version is saved and listed separately.

title: Navigation Blocking on Unsaved Changes
description: Verify that attempting to navigate away from the editor with unsaved changes blocks navigation and prompts the user to confirm.

steps.description: Make unsaved changes in the resume editor.
Attempt to navigate to another page.
Confirm a navigation blocking prompt appears warning about unsaved changes.

title: Admin Dashboard - Role-based Access Control
description: Verify that only users with admin roles can access the admin dashboard and features, and others are denied access.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard with a non-admin user.
Verify access is denied with redirect or error message.
Access the admin dashboard with an admin user.
Confirm full admin features are accessible.

title: Admin Dashboard - User Management Functionality
description: Validate that admin users can view user lists, adjust AI quotas, and update user roles successfully with persistence.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to user management.
Modify AI quota and user roles for a selected user.
Verify changes are saved and effective immediately.

title: Admin Dashboard - Feedback and Contact Message Handling
description: Verify admins can view, respond, and manage user submitted feedback and contact messages.

steps.description: Access admin feedback and contact messages pages.
Confirm all messages are listed with details.
Mark messages as handled or respond where functionality exists.
Validate changes and responses are correctly saved.

title: Contact Form Submission
description: Verify users can submit inquiries via the contact form and receive confirmation of submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the contact page.
Fill in all required fields and submit the form.
Confirm submission success message and data integrity.

title: Feedback Submission Form
description: Validate that users can submit feedback successfully and receive acknowledgement.

steps.description: Go to the feedback page.
Complete the feedback form and submit.
Check for successful submission confirmation.

title: Global Dark Mode Toggle and Persistence
description: Verify that the user can toggle dark mode on/off, the theme changes instantly, and the preference persists across sessions.

steps.description: Toggle dark mode from the UI.
Ensure UI theme updates immediately.
Log out and log back in.
Verify that the selected theme preference persists.

title: Export Resume as ATS-Friendly PDF
description: Validate that resumes can be exported to PDF in an ATS-optimized format with correct layout and print optimization.

steps.description: Open a resume in the editor.
Export the resume to PDF.
Verify the PDF is downloaded, correctly formatted, and compatible with ATS standards.

title: API Rate Limiting Enforcement
description: Verify that the system enforces rate limiting on API endpoints to prevent abuse and returns appropriate HTTP status codes.

steps.description: Send API requests continuously exceeding the rate limit.
Confirm server returns HTTP 429 Too Many Requests, blocking further requests temporarily.

title: JWT Token Expiration and Renewal Handling
description: Validate that expired JWT tokens are rejected and users are required to re-authenticate.

steps.description: Use an expired JWT token to access protected endpoints.
Check that requests are denied with proper authentication error.
Perform login to obtain new valid JWT token.
Confirm new token works for protected API calls.

title: Data Sanitization and XSS Protection
description: Ensure all user inputs in forms and editors are sanitized to prevent cross-site scripting attacks.

steps.description: Input common XSS attack vectors into text fields and editor sections.
Confirm that on save and display, malicious scripts are neutralized and do not execute.

title: Responsive UI Layout Across Devices
description: Verify the application UI, including navigation, dashboard, editor, and admin panel, adjusts appropriately and remains usable on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile resolutions.
Check that navigation menus, buttons, forms, and text scale correctly, no overflow or breakage occurs.
